resources.string: Show me how to send image!
In order to send your picture you should look for \"Share\" icon like one presented below in your gallery application image preview.
In your gallery choose image You want to share and click on it to show it on full screen.
Now you should look for \"Share\" icon that could be displayed in toolbar in the top of screen.
If it\'s not displayed there you could try to expand menu by tapping on icon like one above and then try to find \"Share\" option.
